targets.expr:
sum(delta(um_counter_partner_claim_failed_total{source_cluster=~'$Cluster', pod=~'$deployment'}[1m])) 
+ sum(delta(um_counter_partner_claim_bad_request_total{source_cluster=~'$Cluster', pod=~'$deployment'}[1m])) 
+ sum(delta(um_counter_partner_claim_header_validation_failure_total{source_cluster=~'$Cluster', pod=~'$deployment'}[1m])) 
+ sum(delta(um_counter_partner_claim_invalid_partner_access_key_total{source_cluster=~'$Cluster', pod=~'$deployment'}[1m])) 
+ sum(delta(um_counter_partner_claim_message_digest_check_failure_total{source_cluster=~'$Cluster', pod=~'$deployment'}[1m])) 
+ sum(delta(um_counter_partner_claim_subscription_conflict_total{source_cluster=~'$Cluster', pod=~'$deployment'}[1m]))
